attributes.action: For the EU vote we should low the voting age to 16 as they are the future!
attributes.additional_details: Watching the news and listing to people in school, they want to be heard.  They are the future.
attributes.background: We are voting on behalf of the children and they have a voice as well.  I truly believe children in secondary school should have some way of voting even it we can only go as young as 16 as they have a voice and need to be heard about the future of the country.
